collection.name: Plague Doctor
collection.openText: “I shall heal you, curing you of all disease and injury you possess.”

observe.desc:
[ {<Observation Record_1>
The Abnormality asked: “Why have you not treated that scar?”
Alex replied: “I had no time, so I just gave it a little bit of first aid.”
Then the Plague Doctor answered: “I shall heal you, curing you of all disease and injury you possess.”
Alex came out of the chamber with his scar completely healed.} ]

specialTipSize.specialTip: When the work result was Bad, the Qliphoth Counter decreased.
When the work result was Good, the Qliphoth Counter lowered. $0 then blessed the employee who worked with it.
When a Trumpet Level 2 emergency occurred, the Qliphoth Counter lowered.
When the Qliphoth Counter reached 0, some employees heard $0’s calling and went to its Containment Unit to be blessed.
Those who have been kissed by $0 shall be reborn as the blessed.

etc.param: “And I say also unto thee, That thou art #1, and upon this rock I will build my church; and the gates of hell shall not prevail against it.”
“Tell us, when shall these things be?”
“Lord, wilt thou that we command fire to come down from heaven, and consume them?”
“And #3 and #4; and he surnamed them Boanerges, which is, The sons of thunder.”
“#5 saith unto him, Lord, show us the Father, and it sufficeth us.”
“And as he passed forth from thence, he saw a man, named #6: and he saith unto him, Follow me. And he arose, and followed him.”
“But there was a certain man, called #7, which beforetime in the same city used sorcery, and bewitched the people, giving out that himself was some great one.”
“Then said #8, unto his fellow-disciples, Let us also go, that we may die with him.”
“#9 answered and saith unto him, thou art the Son of God; thou art the King of Israel.”
“#10 saith unto him, Lord, how is it that thou wilt manifest thyself unto us, and not unto the world?”
“From henceforth let no man trouble me: for I bear in my body the marks of Him.”
“He answered them, Have not I chosen you twelve, and one of you is a devil?”
